Name: Mahmoud Zalt
AboutMe:
A highly skilled Back-End Web Developer, with over 5 years of professional experience. Holds a Bachelor of Science Degree in Computing. And specializes in developing high-quality Web Applications and APIs.

PHP is his primary programming language, And Laravel is his favourite framework, he has been using Laravel since version 3 and he has a deep understanding of its codebase.

Some of the tools he uses on a daily basis are PHP - Laravel - Git - MySQL - Neo4j - Redis - Docker - PHPUnit - Codeception - JavaScript - Travis-CI - Amazon S3...

He is dedicated to delivering high-quality code. He adapt the modern PHP techniques and best practices. As well he strives to write easily maintainable and reusable code, that is up to the community standards.

He is a big believer in Automated Testing and his favourite testing framework is Codeception.

He loves software architecture, lately he created his own super robust architecture for developing enterprise web apps.

He loves open source projects, and he has developed multiple open source projects such as Laravel CDN Assets Manager, LaraDock, API Manager, NextPack, URL Shortener and he contributed to others.

During his career, he had the opportunity to build apps for different platforms (Web, Desktop and Mobile) using different programming languages (PHP, JAVA, C#, C++, JavaScript, HTML, CSS).

For him, coding is not a job it is an enjoyable lifestyle. And he enjoys helping people as much as he enjoys coding.
